Today, the South is lighting up with 5 ft @ 8s SSW swell and fresh 14 mph SSW winds. Ballinskelligs Bay and Derrynane are prime spots, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s with moderate 15 mph NNW winds, still workable at sheltered corners. By the day after, conditions improve again with 3 ft @ 8s and light 4 mph SE winds, making it a fun day for a surf session. Best: today.
